import React from 'react' import { faShoppingCart, faUser } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { Navbar, Nav, Container } from 'react-bootstrap' import logo from '../assets/logo.png' const Header = () => { return (
ProShop
